data.title: Hyperion (publisher)
data.meta_description: Hyperion is a general interest book publishing division of The Walt Disney Company, established in 1991. Hyperion publishes books under the following imprints: ABC Daytime Press, ESPN Books, Hyperion Audiobooks, Hyperion East, Miramax Books, and…
data.text:
